title: Portfolio
description: I build my portfolio on my own projects and projects done for clients. Here are some of them.

work.title: Do you want me to work for you?
work.description: Convinced? Contact me and let's talk about your needs and problems!

item0.title: Matma++
item0.description: The app was created by a student for students and includes calculators, tables, and math formulas.

item1.title: Logicos 1, 2, 3, Forever
item1.description: A series of puzzle games appreciated by users. Interesting puzzles, unusual solutions is what distinguishes these games.

item2.title: What's inside
item2.description: A box opening puzzle game for the Universal Windows Platform.

item3.title: QoP-ML Web Tool
item3.description: UI wrapper for making simulations in QoP-ML language.

item4.title: Simple Weather App
item4.description: A simple weather checker application based on an open source API.

item5.title: Dzie≈Ço Biblijne
item5.description: Application with bible texts, readings, theological aids and a map of the holy land. The system includes a CMS panel for managing data in the application.

item6.title: ConstCash
item6.description: A proprietary security-focused personal finance management application. Manage budgets, view statistics and create your own financial goals.

item7.title: ConstCash Web
item7.description: A website showcasing the ConstCash mobile application.
